attributes.action: reduce the number of cannabis plants that are classed as personal use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently if someone is caught growing cannabis plants they can say that they are growing for personal use if they are growing less than 21 plants.
If someone is growing this number for "personal use" they would be permantly stoned. I request that the government lowers this limit to less than 5 plants before someone can be prosecuted for the cultivation of cannabis for supply purposes.
